content:
You are visiting San Francisco for the day and want to meet as many friends as possible. Solve the problem by considering various different schedules and picking the best one to optimize your goals.

Travel distances (in minutes):
Bayview to North Beach: 21.
Bayview to Presidio: 31.
Bayview to Haight-Ashbury: 19.
Bayview to Union Square: 17.
North Beach to Bayview: 22.
North Beach to Presidio: 17.
North Beach to Haight-Ashbury: 18.
North Beach to Union Square: 7.
Presidio to Bayview: 31.
Presidio to North Beach: 18.
Presidio to Haight-Ashbury: 15.
Presidio to Union Square: 22.
Haight-Ashbury to Bayview: 18.
Haight-Ashbury to North Beach: 19.
Haight-Ashbury to Presidio: 15.
Haight-Ashbury to Union Square: 17.
Union Square to Bayview: 15.
Union Square to North Beach: 10.
Union Square to Presidio: 24.
Union Square to Haight-Ashbury: 18.

CONSTRAINTS: You arrive at Bayview at 9:00AM. Barbara will be at North Beach from 1:45PM to 8:15PM. You'd like to meet Barbara for a minimum of 60 minutes. Margaret will be at Presidio from 10:15AM to 3:15PM. You'd like to meet Margaret for a minimum of 30 minutes. Kevin will be at Haight-Ashbury from 8:00PM to 8:45PM. You'd like to meet Kevin for a minimum of 30 minutes. Kimberly will be at Union Square from 7:45AM to 4:45PM. You'd like to meet Kimberly for a minimum of 30 minutes.

Your response should start with 'SOLUTION:'.

Please output the meeting schedule in the following JSON format:
{"itinerary": [{"action": "meet", "person": "<PERSON_NAME>", "start_time": "<HH:MM>", "end_time": "<HH:MM>"}]}. Make sure to include the person's name for each meeting.
